sqlMap.select:
SELECT SOLID_ID as "solidId", SOLID_CODE as "solidCode", SOLID_CODES as "solidCodes", SOLID_NAME as "solidName", SOLID_TYPE as "solidType", STATE as "state", RANK as "rank", SOLID_STATE as "solidState", INDUSTRIAL_DISPOSAL AS "industrialDisposal", SOLID_PRODUCT AS "solidProduct", REMARK as "remark" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config
SOLID_TYPE = #node#
INDUSTRIAL_DISPOSAL = #industrialDisposal#
SOLID_TYPE = #solidType#
SOLID_NAME LIKE #solidName#
order by SOLID_ID asc

SELECT SOLID_ID as "solidId", SOLID_CODE as "solidCode", SOLID_CODES as "solidCodes", SOLID_NAME as "solidName", SOLID_TYPE as "solidType", STATE as "state", RANK as "rank", SOLID_STATE as "solidState",
INDUSTRIAL_DISPOSAL as "industrialDisposal", SOLID_PRODUCT as "solidProduct", IRON_MUD as "ironMud", REMARK as "remark" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config
IRON_MUD = #ironMud#
SOLID_PRODUCT = #solidProduct#
SOLID_TYPE like #P_ename#
SOLID_STATE like #solidState#
order by SOLID_ID asc

SELECT SOLID_ID as "solidId", SOLID_CODE as "solidCode", SOLID_CODES as "solidCodes", SOLID_NAME as "solidName", SOLID_TYPE as "solidType", STATE as "state", RANK as "rank", SOLID_STATE as "solidState", INDUSTRIAL_DISPOSAL as "industrialDisposal", SOLID_PRODUCT as "solidProduct", IRON_MUD as "ironMud", REMARK as "remark" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config
IRON_MUD = #ironMud#
SOLID_PRODUCT = #solidProduct#
SOLID_STATE like #solidState#
SOLID_NAME like #solidName#
order by SOLID_ID asc

SELECT SOLID_ID as "solidId", SOLID_TYPE as "SolidType", SOLID_NAME as "SolidName", SOLID_CODE as "solidCode", RANK as "rank" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config where SOLID_STATE = '启用'
SOLID_TYPE = #solidType#
SOLID_NAME LIKE #solidName#
order by SOLID_ID asc
SELECT SOLID_ID as "solidId" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config order by SOLID_ID desc limit 1
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config ( SOLID_ID, SOLID_NAME , SOLID_CODES , STATE , RANK , SOLID_STATE , SOLID_PRODUCT, IRON_MUD, REMARK ) VALUES ( #solidId: VARCHAR# , #solidName: VARCHAR# , #solidName: VARCHAR# , #state: VARCHAR# , #rank: VARCHAR# , #solidState: VARCHAR# , #solidProduct: VARCHAR# , #ironMud: VARCHAR# , #remark: VARCHAR# )

INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config ( SOLID_ID, SOLID_NAME , SOLID_CODES , SOLID_TYPE , STATE , RANK , SOLID_STATE , SOLID_PRODUCT, IRON_MUD, REMARK ) VALUES ( #solidId: VARCHAR# , #solidName: VARCHAR# , #solidName: VARCHAR# , #solidType: VARCHAR# , #state: VARCHAR# , #rank: VARCHAR# , #solidState: VARCHAR# , #solidProduct: VARCHAR# , #ironMud: VARCHAR# , #remark: VARCHAR# )

INSERT INTO ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config ( SOLID_ID, SOLID_NAME , SOLID_CODE , SOLID_CODES , SOLID_TYPE , STATE , RANK , SOLID_STATE , SOLID_PRODUCT, IRON_MUD, INDUSTRIAL_DISPOSAL, REMARK ) VALUES ( #solidId: VARCHAR# , #solidName: VARCHAR# , #solidCode: VARCHAR# , #solidCode: VARCHAR# , #solidType: VARCHAR# , #state: VARCHAR# , #rank: VARCHAR# , #solidState: VARCHAR# , #solidProduct: VARCHAR# , #ironMud: VARCHAR# , #industrialDisposal: VARCHAR# , #remark: VARCHAR# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config SET SOLID_NAME = #solidName# , SOLID_CODE = #solidCode# , SOLID_CODES = #solidCode# , SOLID_TYPE = #solidType# , STATE = #state# , RANK = #rank# , SOLID_STATE = #solidState#,
INDUSTRIAL_DISPOSAL = #industrialDisposal#, SOLID_PRODUCT = #solidProduct#, IRON_MUD = #ironMud#, REMARK = #remark# WHERE SOLID_ID = #solidId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT SOLID_TYPE as "solidType" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config where solid_Type!='固废名称'
SOLID_TYPE = #solidType#

SELECT SOLID_ID as "solidId", SOLID_CODE as "solidCode", SOLID_CODES as "solidCodes", SOLID_NAME as "solidName", SOLID_TYPE as "solidType", STATE as "state", RANK as "rank", SOLID_STATE as "solidState", REMARK as "remark" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config
SOLID_TYPE != #solidType#
order by SOLID_ID asc
SELECT SOLID_CODES as "solidCodes", SOLID_NAME as "solidName" FROM ${hbSchema}.T_HM_solidwaste_config WHERE SOLID_TYPE = '固废名称' order by SOLID_ID asc
